info.name: Herd Hero
info.attribution:
Game layout, library image, and scripting by Robin Harn, released to the Public Domain under CC0.

The following graphics are from https://game-icons.net and are used under CC BY 3.0:
* Card Play https://game-icons.net/1x1/quoting/card-play.html
* Trash Can https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/trash-can.html
* Card Joker https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/card-joker.html
* Cat https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/cat.html
* Mite https://game-icons.net/1x1/carl-olsen/mite-alt.html
* Sea Turtle https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/sea-turtle.html
* Chicken https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/chicken.html
* Koala https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/koala.html
* Kangaroo https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/kangaroo.html
* Squid https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/squid.html
* Elephant https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/elephant.html
* Donkey https://game-icons.net/1x1/skoll/donkey.html
* Dolphin https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/dolphin.html
* Parrot https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/parrot-head.html
* Swan https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/swan.html
* Fox https://game-icons.net/1x1/caro-asercion/fox.html
* Cross Mark https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/cross-mark.html

The following graphics are from Google Noto Color Emoji and are used under the SIL Open Font License: https://fonts.google.com/noto/specimen/Noto+Color+Emoji
* Left Arrow https://emojipedia.org/google/16.0/left-arrow
* Right Arrow https://emojipedia.org/google/16.0/right-arrow
info.description: Deploy herds of animals, steal herds from opponents, and upgrade your hand strategically from the market to become the best wrangler in town!
info.similarAwards:
2018 Juego del Año Recommended
2015 Origins Awards Best Card Game Nominee
2014 Spiel der Spiele Game of the Year Winner
2014 Meeples Choice Award Nominee
2014 International Gamers Award - General Strategy: Multi-player Nominee
2014 Golden Geek Best Card Game Nominee
2014 Fairplay À la carte Winner
2014 Essener Feder Best Written Rules Winner
info.helpText:
* To deploy a herd of animals, drag cards from your hand into the next available empty row under your name. A new available empty row will then appear under it for future turns.

* To steal a herd of animals from an opponent, or to take back a herd of animals into your hand, click on the hand icon next to that row of cards on the board.

* To trash a herd of animals before replacing them via the market, click on the trash icon next to that row of cards on the board.

* In the rare instance you're able to deploy more than seven herds of animals, you will have to manually track them instead of dragging them into a new row (this implementation only displays up to seven rows due to space constraints).
